results.title: Beta-blockers for tenacious saliva: a case report.
results.text_hl: This case report describes the care of a 75-year-old gentleman with metastatic @<m>DISEASE_Head_and_Neck_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006258 @@@head and neck cancer@@@ who was highly symptomatic with intractable tenacious oropharyngeal secretions.

citations.NLM: Woodman MJ, Howard P. Beta-blockers for tenacious saliva: a case report. BMJ Support Palliat Care. 2022 Mar 24;():. PMID: 35332025
citations.BibTeX: @article{35332025, title={Beta-blockers for tenacious saliva: a case report.}, author={Woodman MJ and Howard P}, journal={BMJ Support Palliat Care}}

results.title: Effects of some beta-adrenergic blockers on male fertility parameters in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (18 mg/kg.b.wt.), @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ (7 mg/kg.b.wt.) and @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@ (7.5 and 15 mg/kg.b.wt.) induced significant increase in @<m>DISEASE_Head_and_Neck_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006258 @@@sperm head and tail abnormalities@@@ at first day after the last repeated dose.

citations.NLM: el-Sayed MG, el-Sayed MT, Elazab Abd el S, Hafeiz MH, el-Komy AA, Hassan E. Effects of some beta-adrenergic blockers on male fertility parameters in rats. Dtsch Tierarztl Wochenschr. 1998 Jan;105(1):10-2. PMID: 9499626
